name: Presentation of Financial Statements
description: Complete set of financial statements must include Statement of Financial Position, Statement of Profit and Loss, Statement of Changes in Equity, Statement of Cash Flows, and Notes
requirements: Entity must present a complete set of financial statements including Balance Sheet, P&L, Cash Flow Statement, Statement of Changes in Equity, and comprehensive notes to accounts

name: Statement of Cash Flows
description: Cash flows must be classified into operating, investing, and financing activities
requirements: Cash flow statement must separately disclose cash flows from operating activities, investing activities, and financing activities

name: Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors
description: Disclosure of significant accounting policies and changes
requirements: Entity must disclose significant accounting policies, changes in accounting estimates, and corrections of prior period errors

name: Events After Reporting Period
description: Disclosure of material events occurring after balance sheet date
requirements: Disclose material events occurring between balance sheet date and date of approval of financial statements

name: Property, Plant and Equipment
description: Disclosure of PPE, depreciation methods, and useful lives
requirements: Disclose carrying amount, depreciation method, useful lives, gross carrying amount and accumulated depreciation for each class of PPE

name: Employee Benefits
description: Disclosure of employee benefit obligations and expenses
requirements: Disclose defined benefit plans, defined contribution plans, short-term employee benefits, and post-employment benefits

name: Related Party Disclosures
description: Disclosure of related party relationships and transactions
requirements: Disclose nature of related party relationships, transactions with related parties, and outstanding balances including key management personnel compensation

name: Earnings Per Share
description: Calculation and disclosure of basic and diluted EPS
requirements: Disclose basic and diluted earnings per share for profit/loss from continuing operations and profit/loss for the period

name: Impairment of Assets
description: Recognition and measurement of impairment losses
requirements: Assess assets for impairment indicators and recognize impairment loss if recoverable amount is less than carrying amount

name: Provisions, Contingent Liabilities and Contingent Assets
description: Recognition and disclosure of provisions and contingencies
requirements: Recognize provisions when present obligation exists, disclose contingent liabilities and contingent assets
